name: Noisrevni
description:
Noisrevni is a turn-based card combat game where you can invert what a card says. You place as Mona, a follower of the art of Honi in the journey to banish a person who resides in a snowy mountain. Use your temperature shifting, attacking and healing cards to defeat this criminal. 

Inversion Guide:

If Hot Then, If Cold Then

Do 2 DMG, Heal 5 HP

Do 5 DMG, Heal 2 HP

Do 1 Burn, Do 2 Freeze

Do 2 Burn, Do 1 Freeze

Double Temp, Half Temp

But Lose 2 HP, But Heal 5 Enemy

But Lose 5 HP, But Heal 2 Enemy
